profile.profileDescription: Use this profile if you want a system that is compliant with simple DublinCore

label.name_singular: Essence of Materials: Artifice and Nature
label.name_plural: Essence of Materials: Artifice and Nature

label.name: Appraised value (high end or exact amount)
Date of birth - date of death
Georeference
label.description: Coordinates documenting the location of the item

label.name: Date
label.description: A point or period of time associated with an event in the life cycle of the resource.

label.name: Library of Congress Subject Headings
label.description: Library of Congress Subject headings describing this object. To add a new heading simply type the first few letters of the heading and choose the desired one from the displayed list of possible matches.

label.name: Alternate identifier (picPath)
label.description: Any additional unambiguous reference to the resource within a given context; in this case the image file name.

label.name: Designer
label.description: Designer involved with loan (if not part of Entity authority)

label.name: Legacy storage location
label.description: Storage location data from MS Access database

label.name: Legacy appraisal value
label.description: Appraisal value denoted in MS Access
